name: Tumblr fix tag suggestion box
description: Ever noticed how the tag suggestion box just is too small? This makes the box wider, providing enough width to actually read all those tags.

user.name: Mike Gebirge
user.about: I'm just some tumblr user that is annoyed by tumblr's shortcomings that even I can fix in a few minutes. So here they are, a few of them. For updates, follow http://kedaiyis-fixes.tumblr.com/
